name: Bombing Run (Flynn)
description:
This is just a quick game I threw together in a week to try out the MonoGame framework. WASD to move, space to drop a bomb.

There is no end game, it's just a 'get as far as you can before losing' game. There are missile silo's and boats to bomb, and each has one missile to shoot at you with.

There's no installer, just unzip and run the executable.
